confirm_deletion.title: Delete {{itemType}}?
confirm_deletion.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the <0>{{itemName}}</0> {{itemType}} and remove all associated data.
confirm_deletion.warning: If you delete this {{itemType}}, you will lose all work associated with it forever.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized Access
unauthorized.description: You do not have permission to view that page.
